author: Vithushan Ehantharajah, Vithushan Ehantharajah
title: 10,000 miles from home, newly-married Lauren Winfield is keeping her sunny disposition
description: The England cricketer tells Vithushan Ehantharajah how she and new wife Courtney Hill are staying positive in a unprecedented situation
content:
Last week in Westminster Baroness Fiona Shackleton, one of the United Kingdoms leading divorce lawyers, told her peers self-isolation and restricted movement brought about by the Covid-19 pandemic will result in a steep rise in marriages breaking down. 
Her … [+11075 chars]
